recommendations: Dr Satya Brahma ‚ÄúWoman of substance. A fine blend of leadership & innovations. Swadha has been impressive & phenomenal. Very few woman leaders have the guts to defy odds & embrace change & take risks specially when the wheels are the opposites. A crisis management expert & a great research scholar. Her core expertise lies in exploring hidden territories that can generate results. Swadha Arora is one the most powerful example of women leadership & has an impressive & impact personality that vividly speaks to the fact that a different type of leadership is in demand and breeds better results‚Äîdecisiveness combined with empathy and weighted rational thinking, including during high-stress and high-stakes situations. Resilience is the key challenge in a world of continuous disruption and rising uncertainty. To prevent damage and capture opportunities, resilience leaders are needed. Swadha is the leader to watch out for. Best Wishes to her.‚Äù

Nagraj Kamat ‚ÄúSwadha was my batchmate in IIM. She is very confident and has excellent communication and presentation skills.. She possesses a rare combination of knowledge of Engineering, Marketing, communications art and culture both national and international. She also has an eye for detailing.. With age and experience she will attain greater heights in her career. It was fun working with her and doing assignments in IIM. I wish her all the best in her future endeavours.‚Äù
